title: 神奇宝贝服务器问题！！！
author: Ivor_
txt_content: 我弄了个神奇宝贝的服务器，怎么不生精灵，只是生怪，还有这么弄精灵的出现几率

replies.author: BBODY
replies.txt_content: 你等待吧可能你那个版本不对

replies.author: qx180180726
replies.txt_content:
找到配置文件pixelmon.cfg



    I:"Max number of Air Pokemon (at one time)"=20
    I:"Max number of Land Pokemon (at one time)"=40
    I:"Max number of Underground Pokemon (at one time)"=60
    I:"Max number of Water Pokemon (at one time)"=20

分别是
空中的
陆地的
地下的
水里的神奇宝贝数量最大值
